page.title: 02About Cheadle (K.Tildesley)
page.content: Cheadle is a small town with a population of only 10,400. It has a High Street with a wide range of shops for everyone. There are 2 Supermarkets, dress shops,babywear shops & shoe shops,to name a few.There are 3 Banks & 3 Building Societies. There are 2 Chemists,2 Cake shops & 3 Fish & Chip Shops & a Chinese Take Away,to cater for everyone's needs.Then there is the Leisure Centre which is great for young & old.You can play on Tean Road Rec.It has a Bowling Green, a Putting Green & 2 Tennis Courts.We have our own Library & Main Post Office & plenty of Pubs. There are 2 main Churches both called St.Giles. The spire of the Catholic Church (designed by Pugin) can be seen for miles. There are 3 Primary & 2 Secondary Schools.We are lucky to live near to Alton Towers.
